segments.text: How are your Chinese and English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can confidently say that my Chinese and English are pretty good . I won prizes in many speech contests in both Chinese and English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would you consider your salary if you succeed in becoming a translator in our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe every company has its own salary criterion . And you will give me a satisfying salary according to my abilities and performances .
segments.speaker: S2
